channel.title: CVE Feed for Darren Cooney -- WordPress Infinite Scroll – Ajax Load More
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Darren Cooney -- WordPress Infinite Scroll – Ajax Load More

item.title: CVE-2023-50874|2024-08-02T22:23:44.075Z -- darren%20cooney -- wordpress%20infinite%20scroll%20%E2%80%93%20ajax%20load%20more
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Darren Cooney WordPress Infinite Scroll – Ajax Load More allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WordPress Infinite Scroll – Ajax Load More: from n/a through 6.1.0.1.
